entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
